resources.string: \nThe creators of this game are Sodium. For more information about this app, check out this resource: CMPT276

This app provides achievement goals to turn some competitive board games into a more co-operative experience.
 
At the end of a game, the combined score of all players is used to calculate a combined achievement level, with a higher total score earning a better achievement.
 
Sources:

Google 		 Google 		 Google

Sorry, the combined score is too low. Please try a bigger number
